dict.acceptation: 驾驶员，司机；驱动器，驱动程序；驱逐者，驱赶者；（高尔夫球）球棒；

sent.orig: Winpcap work in the driver (Driver) layer, can be highly efficient network operation.
sent.trans: Winpcap工作于驱动(Driver)层，所以能以很高的效率进行网络操作。

sent.orig: Please make sure to read Driver Installation Hints Document before you install this driver.
sent.trans: 请切记阅读安装提示司机在你安装这个驱动文件。

sent.orig: The driver can not detect the disk, please put the disk into the driver correctly.
sent.trans: “驱动器没有检测到磁盘，请将磁盘放入驱动器”英文怎么翻译啊？

sent.orig: You can and PDD layers by implementing your device driver as a monolithic driver.
sent.trans: 你完全可以把你的设备实现为一个单体的驱动程序。

sent.orig: Figure3-17. Driver selection page for Driver Verifier.
sent.trans: 图3-17。驱动匹配的驱动选项页。
